narratives.Outcome: Successfully restored service in 45 minutes with no data loss. Impact: 15% of users experienced degraded performance.
narratives.Strengths: Clear runbook made initial diagnosis fast. Team communication was excellent. Failover process worked as designed.
narratives.Weaknesses: Monitoring didn't catch the disk space issue until after the failure. Manual failover took 20 minutes due to unclear documentation. No automated alerts for disk utilization.
narratives.Lessons: Automate database failover to reduce recovery time. Add canary queries to detect degradation early. Implement disk space alerts at 70% threshold. Update runbook with clearer failover steps.

narrative.Detail: Production alert fired for API timeouts
Database disk space at 100%, causing writes to fail
Cleared old log files to free 20GB space
Scaled database volume and verified service health
